System.config({
    transpiler: "ts",
    typescriptOptions: {
            target: "es5",
            module: "commonjs",
            moduleResolution: "node",
            emitDecoratorMetadata: true,
            experimentalDecorators: true,
            "jsx": "react"
    },
     meta: {
      'typescript': {
        "exports": "ts"
      },
      '*.json': { loader: 'plugin-json' }
